job description:
Company :Allegheny Health NetworkJob Description :

GENERAL OVERVIEW:

Designs and implements reports, analyzes data and monitors statistical information to promote and guide quality and cost-effective care.

ESSENTIAL RESPONSIBILITIES:
  • Collects and maintains data for reporting. Maintains weekly and monthly quality scorecard reports. Maintains data/reporting logs to support System groups. (25%)
  • Understands and utilizes quality software for analysis. (25%)
  • Supports innovative reporting for professional/publishable views of performance and quality measures. (10%)
  • Assists with submission of all quality reporting. May assists with clinical chart reviews. (10%)
  • Assists with data assurance for and produces quality reporting to analyze core measures. Supports all ad hoc project requests related to clinical, operational and statistical reporting. (10%)
  • Supports abstraction process and software related maintenance. (10%)
  • Supports team with interfacing of disparate systems to a centralized report writer and data base warehouse to create accurate and professional reporting. (10%)
  • Performs other duties as assigned or required.
QUALIFICATIONS:

Minimum
  • Bachelor's degree in Business, Health Information Management, or a Clinical degree with experience in data development and analysis.
Preferred
  • Master’s degree.
  • BSN degree.
  • 1-3 years’ data/business analysis experience.
  • 1-3 years’ healthcare experience.
